com.paydiant.android.ui.service.account

Interface IPaymentAccountBalanceRefreshListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPaymentAccountManagementListener, IPaymentAccountManagementMetaDataListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IProvisionAccountListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaymentAccountManagementListenerAdapter

    public interface IPaymentAccountBalanceRefreshListener
extends IPaymentAccountManagementMetaDataListener
    The listener interface for receiving payment account balance refresh events Note: App developers are encouraged to use the ListenerAdapter implementations whenever possible as the Listener interfaces might get updated with new functionality/methods from one SDK release to the other. Therefore using a ListenerAdapter will make sure that there wont be any compilation issues due to unimplemented methods during a SDK upgrade.

    Author:
    Paydiant
    See Also:
    PaymentAccountManagementListenerAdapter
